title: AI-Assisted Development Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of working with AI coding assistants and set up your development environment

modules.title: Introduction to Vibe Coding
objectives: Learn how AI assistants can accelerate development
Set up Claude Code, Code Puppy, or Codex

content.introduction: Welcome to the world of AI-assisted development! In this module, you'll learn how to 'vibe' with AI tools to build software faster and more efficiently than ever before.

sections.heading: What is Vibe Coding?
sections.content: Vibe coding is the practice of building software through natural language conversations with AI assistants. Instead of writing every line of code manually, you describe what you want to build, and the AI helps generate, debug, and improve the code.

sections.heading: Why AI-Assisted Development?
sections.content: AI tools can help you: write boilerplate code faster, debug complex issues, learn new languages and frameworks, refactor existing code, and generate tests and documentation.

exercises.title: Hello AI World
exercises.description: Use your AI assistant to create a 'Hello World' program in 3 different languages
hints: Try asking: 'Create a Hello World program in Python'
Then ask: 'Now convert this to JavaScript'
Finally: 'Show me the same in Go'
exercises.solution: Ask your AI: 'Create Hello World programs in Python, JavaScript, and Go with explanations'

exercises.title: Code Explanation
exercises.description: Find a piece of code online and ask your AI to explain how it works
hints: Copy any code snippet from GitHub
Ask: 'Can you explain what this code does line by line?'
Follow up with: 'How could this be improved?'

project.title: Your First AI Collaboration
project.description: Work with your AI to build a simple calculator that can add, subtract, multiply, and divide
requirements: Include a simple user interface (CLI is fine)
Add at least one advanced feature (square root, percentages, etc.)
starter_prompts: Help me build a calculator program
Add error handling for division by zero
How can I make the interface more user-friendly?

modules.title: Effective Prompting Strategies
objectives: Master the art of writing clear, effective prompts
Understand how to iterate and refine requests

content.introduction: The key to successful AI-assisted development is knowing how to communicate your needs clearly. This module teaches you proven prompting strategies.

sections.heading: The Anatomy of a Good Prompt
sections.content: A good prompt includes: Clear context, Specific requirements, Expected output format, and Examples when helpful.

sections.heading: Common Prompting Patterns
sections.content: 1. The Specification Pattern: 'Create a function that...' 2. The Debugging Pattern: 'This code has a bug...' 3. The Refactoring Pattern: 'Improve this code by...' 4. The Learning Pattern: 'Explain how...'

exercises.title: Prompt Refinement
exercises.description: Start with a vague prompt and iteratively make it better
exercises.refined_prompt: Create a responsive portfolio website with a navigation bar, hero section, projects grid, and contact form using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript

exercises.title: Debugging Challenge
exercises.description: Use AI to find and fix bugs in provided code

modules.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
objectives: Set up version control with Git

content.introduction: A proper development environment is crucial for productive coding. Let's set up everything you need for your 8-week journey.

checklist.item: Install a code editor (VS Code recommended)
Install Claude Code, Code Puppy, or Codex
Set up SSH keys for GitHub

project.title: Initialize Your Project Repository
steps: Create a new repository on GitHub
Clone it to your local machine
